alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 1:05AM CST until February 09 at 1:21PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Sunday the stage was 66.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 70.2 feet by Monday evening. The river will begin to fall on Tuesday and fall below flood stage by Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
